text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS @FDAgov China should be pressured and hold accountable for not cooperating and limiting investigation for the nature and origin of Covid19. CHINESE LEADERS Must know IF THEY DONT COOPERATE, ENIRE  WORLD ALONG WITH THEM WILL CONTINUE TO SUFFER.
